attributes.action: Stop the passing of the Online Safety Bill (Royal Ascent)
attributes.additional_details:
To use logic this will not solve the problem you are insulting the general public by trying to make this law.

As with everything there will be ways to get round this with a VPN/Tor or the latter.

Why should the majority be penalised by the actions of the minority?
attributes.background:
To stop the royal ascent of the Online Safety Bill 

This will not get you anywhere all you are doing is weakening everyone's privacy.

Do us a favour scrap the bill because this is just an excuse to scan everyones messages, What about your own messages?
